comment.author: 47859152@N05
comment._content: It's great to see these old post boxes.  I'm glad Australia did there own designs.  Thank you for sharing them.

comment.author: 69269002@N04
comment._content: We're very glad you appreciate them and will mention your comment to the person behind this project, Adel Briggs. There are quite a few more images still to be included in this online collection, and this will happen soon.
